name: Beneath The Iris
description:
Trapped in an abandoned facility, guide Iris through the neglected hallways of a robot production factory. Though the site is now defunct, the robots within still sense your presence...

The game features a side-scrolling camera which adapts to its surroundings. Solve puzzles to escape as ravenous robots hunt you down.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • E - Interact
